about_the_game:
SINGULARIUM is about going FAST

Zip through levels as fast as you can! Left click and hold to place a black hole, which will allow you to swing around, manipulating gravity to your every whim.
detailed_description:
SINGULARIUM is about going FAST

Zip through levels as fast as you can! Left click and hold to place a black hole, which will allow you to swing around, manipulating gravity to your every whim.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617 1536 MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Singularium Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750, 2.66 GHz | AMD Phenom II X3 720, 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: At its very core, SINGULARIUM is a game about speed. It's a Fast-Paced 3D platformer, that has you using the various movement mechanics to their fullest, such as wallrunning, bunny hopping, and your ability to create black holes that pull you around, to try to beat each level with a fast time.
